headline.main: HITLER HELD GUIDE ON WAY TO PEACE; From Him We Should Learn to Think in Terms of World Order, Dr. Jackh Says

lead_paragraph: Ironic though an Armistice Day peace conference might appear on the surface, the one conducted yesterday by Sir Norman Angell at Town Hall provided an example of how men representing widely divergent viewpoints can agree on the fundamental principles of a permanent world peace.
abstract: World authority statement approved by Leipziger Foundation peace conf
